body:
Although this is an old issue I still want to point you to my [Direct3D9 wrapper](https://github.com/gonutz/d3d9).
It still needs a C compiler (it was tested with MinGW 32 and 64) but you do not have to install any extra libraries or drivers for it to work.
I am also thinking about providing a version of the wrapper that does not use CGo, similar to what [w32](https://github.com/AllenDang/w32) does but I have yet to find out how to do that. Until then, _only_ installing MinGW seems OK.
